activities: Frontage Laboratories, Inc. company is engaged in the business of providing contract drug development services, including GMP/GLP sample analysis, bioanalytical sample analysis, methods development, formulation development and GMP manufacturing, organic synthesis, preclinical, and clinical Phase I-IV services and the Subsidiary is engaged in the business of providing full clinical services in technical capability and management of clinical trials. Services include the following capabilities: Clinical study design and execution, Project management, Site identification and qualification, Clinical study monitoring, Pharmacovigilance and Medical Monitoring, Medical writing, Regulatory consulting, Quality assurance auditing and Regulatory submissions. During the clinical trial for our clients, certain personal data information will be received for the purpose of study.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Clinical trial data and all other personal data informaion from Clients
recoursemech: Frontage will use the arbitration and mediation mechanism offered by JAMS (JAMS Safe Harbor Program) to hear complaint in compliance with the Frameworks.
